text: 安装运行环境 1.安装pip2.安装mysqldb 参考http://192.168.1.244/hainan-bigdata/recommender/wikis/home3.pip install -i https://pypi.douban.com/simple/ -r requirements.txt 开始爬虫 1.爬取版署 检查网络是否正常, 版署服务器是否正常 http://www.capub.cn:8888/pdm/business/CipInfoAction.do?method=checkApproveNo (post请求)nohup python -u tbl_banshu.py >> logs/python.log >&1 & 2.爬取豆瓣 检查网络是否正常 ,豆瓣服务器是否正常 https://api.douban.com/v2/book/ (get请求) https://book.douban.com/ (get请求)nohup python -u tbl_book.py.py >> logs/python.log >&1 &
